org.streaminer.stream.frequency

Class CountMinSketch<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streaminer.stream.frequency.BaseFrequency<T>
      • org.streaminer.stream.frequency.CountSketch<T>
        • org.streaminer.stream.frequency.CountMinSketch<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseFrequency<T>, IRichFrequency<T>, ISimpleFrequency<T>

    public class CountMinSketch<T>
extends CountSketch<T>

    Learner-part of the implementation of the CountMinSketch algorithm from the paper 'An improved data stream summary: the count-min sketch and its applications' written by 'Cormode, G. and Muthukrishnan, S. (2003)'.

    Author:
    Marcin Skirzynski (main work), Benedikt Kulmann (modifications)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.streaminer.stream.frequency.CountSketch

        data, elementsCounted, functionClass, h, k, s, topItems

      • Fields inherited from class org.streaminer.stream.frequency.BaseFrequency

        defaultMinSupport

      Constructors

      Constructor of the CountMinSketch algorithm.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long estimateFrequency(T item)
      Estimates the frequency by returning the smallest frequency value for each hasfunction index.
      protected void initializeHashes(int domain, int nrOfHashFunctions, int nrOfbuckets)
      We only need the h-hash functions since the CountMinSketch algorithm always increments the values in the data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CountMinSketch

        public CountMinSketch(int domain,
              int nrOfHashFunctions,
              int nrOfbuckets,
              int k)

        Constructor of the CountMinSketch algorithm. This construction can take quite a long time since the construction of the hashfunctions is rather time-consuming.

        Parameters:
        domain - The (estim.) domain, i.e. how many different items are expected
        numberOfHashFunctions - The number of hashfunctions which determine a bucket
        numberOfBuckets - The number of buckets where a counter will be maintained
        k - parameter for the top-k variant. If you want to disable the top-k overhead, than set k to 0 or lower

    • Method Detail

      • initializeHashes

        protected void initializeHashes(int domain,
                    int nrOfHashFunctions,
                    int nrOfbuckets)

        We only need the h-hash functions since the CountMinSketch algorithm always increments the values in the data.

        Parameters:
        domain - the (estim.) domain, i.e. how many different items are expected
        nrOfHashFunctions - the number of hashfunctions which determine a bucket
        nrOfbuckets - the number of buckets where a counter will be maintained

      • updateData

        protected boolean updateData(T item)

        Updating the data. For each hashfunction the corresponding bucket will be incremented by one.

        Overrides:
        updateData in class CountSketch<T>
        Parameters:
        item - the item to insert into the data structure
        Returns:

      • estimateFrequency

        public long estimateFrequency(T item)

        Estimates the frequency by returning the smallest frequency value for each hasfunction index.

        Overrides:
        estimateFrequency in class CountSketch<T>
        Parameters:
        item - the item which frequency shall be estimated
        Returns:
        the estimated frequency of the item
